attributes.action: Stop Islamic Sharia Law being used in Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The most senior judge in England and Wales has said that aspects of Islamic sharia law could be used in the UK, provided they don't conflict with existing laws.
I say that Islamic sharia law should not be used in the United Kingdom and the Prime Minister should do everything within his power to stop it being introduced.
